entry.title: Open Access Monographs: Topoi: Berlin Studies of the Ancient World / Berliner Studien der Alten Welt
entry.content:
[First posted in AWOL 22 July 2012. Updated 25 January 2013]


Topoi: Berlin Studies of the Ancient World / Berliner Studien der Alten Welt
The series: Topoi. Berlin Studies of the Ancient World brings together contributions from all fields of classical studies, from pre- and early history and classical archeology to ancient philosophy, theory of science and theology. Monographs and volumes which present the research results of the Excellence Cluster Topoi form a major focus of the series. Additional topics are currently being planned.
Selected titles from the series Topoi. Berlin Studies of the Ancient World will be freely accessible in digital form on the Internet at the date of print publication. The series regards itself as a pilot project on how to combine open access with the support of professional publishers in the publication of current research.

Volumes already published

  • 1 – Babylon (2011)
    eds. Cancik-Kirschbaum, Eva / Ess, Margarete van / Marzahn, Joachim
  • 2 – Syro-Hittite Monumental Art and the Archaeology of Performance (2011)
    by Alessandra Gilibert (reviews on this publication here and here.)
  • 3 – Militärsiedlungen und Territorialherrschaft in der Antike (2010)
    ed. Daubner, Frank (A review on this publication here.)
  • 4 – Rom und Mailand in der Spätantike (2011)ed. Fuhrer, Therese (reviews on this publication here, here, and here.)
  • 5 - Population Dynamics in Pre- and Early History (2012)
    eds. Burger, Joachim / Kaiser, Elke
  • 6 – Kommunikationsräume im kaiserzeitlichen Rom (2012)
    ed. Mundt, Felix
  • 7 – 2000 Jahre Varusschlacht. Geschichte – Archäologie – Legenden (2012)
    eds. Baltrusch, Ernst / Hegewisch, Morten / Meyer, Michael / Puschner, Uwe / Wendt, Christian
  • 10 – Hort und Raum (2012)
    eds. Hansen, Svend / Neumann, Daniel / Vachta, Tilmann
  • 11 Bild – Raum – Handlung (2012)
    eds. Dally, Ortwin / Moraw, Susanne / Ziemssen, Hauke

Forthcoming Volumes

  • The Archaeology of Political Spaces (to be published in April 2013) 
    ed. Bonatz, Dominik
  • Mobilität und Wissenstransfer in diachroner und interdisziplinärer Perspektive
    (to be published in March 2013) eds. Kaiser, Elke / Schier, Wolfram
  • Spatial analysis and social spaces (to be published in March 2013) eds. Paliou, Eleftheria / Lieberwirth, Undine / Polla, Silvia
  • Tumulus as Sema (to be published in March 2013) eds. Henry, Olivier / Kelp, Ute
 And see all the Open Access Publications of TOPOI
